name: Cookies are EVERYWHERE.
description:
Day  - ???

"Somewhere far away there is a paradise 

All is perfect, all is nice

I see children receiving treats as they smile

I sit in the corner and I feel the anger boiling deep within

I realized I wasn't happy with myself where I was

I decided to change fate.

Rage burns in my heart burning in hatred

Only when the seals are broken they will realize

The things they loved and the things they adored

They were all a sham"
